co-star.translation[0].definitions[0].de: one of two or more famous actors who appear together in a film or play
co-star.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to be working in a film or play with other famous actors
co-star.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: She’s co-starring in a TV version of the 1960s thriller.
He co-starred with Bruce Willis in the movie ‘Die Hard’.
